schema.title: PersistentVolume
schema.description: This describes a requirement for persistent, read-only or read-write storage that should be available to the containerapp on runtime. The name of this object MUST be 'persistentVolume'

name.description: A name associated with the storage requirement.

accessMode.description: Access mode in which the persitent volume will be available

tests.description: llama-70b generated negative; focus on minimum keyword
tests.rust_error: -1 is less than the minimum of 0
